summary: A pair of women decide to prank their roommate's nerdy blind date after she stands him up, but end up developing a friendship with him after their practical joke sends them on an all-night odyssey through the 1980s club scene.
cast: Cynthia Gibb|Virginia Madsen|Clayton Rohner|Daphne Zuniga|Chris Nash|Stephen Shellen|Rick Overton|Pamela Springsteen|Josh Richman|Martin Ferrero|Quin Kessler|Sharron Shayne|Mark Holton|John Dye|Troy Evans|Mike Pniewski|Gary Goetzman|Tawny Freret|Yvette Holland Vasquez|Michael Frost|Richard Fullerton|Stuart Charno|J.L. keywords: disc jockey|woman in a bathtub|nightclub|fountain|mistaken identity
title: Chicas modernas
